  • Method Details

    • deleteSubscriptions

      public NotificationAPIV2Api.DeleteSubscriptionsAdapter deleteSubscriptions(String hrn, String notificationStreamLayerId, Optional<com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.notifications.DeleteRequest> deleteRequest)
      Path: /layers/{notificationStreamLayerId}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : (OK - Successfully deleted)

      code 404 : String (Not Found - No provided subscriptions exist)

      code 409 : String (Some of the provided subscriptions does not exist. Returning subscriptions that do not exist.)

      code 500 : String (Internal Server Error)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      notificationStreamLayerId - Stream Layer ID for which we are retrieving subscriptions for.
      deleteRequest - The subscription request object to create a subscription.

    • deleteSubscriptions

      public NotificationAPIV2Api.DeleteSubscriptionsBuilder deleteSubscriptions()

      public NotificationAPIV2Api.GetSubscriptionsAdapter getSubscriptions(String hrn, String notificationStreamLayerId)
      Path: /layers/{notificationStreamLayerId}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : Seq[String] (OK)

      code 404 : String (Not Found)

      code 500 : String (Internal Server Error)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      notificationStreamLayerId - Stream Layer ID for which we are retrieving subscriptions for.

    • subscribe

      public NotificationAPIV2Api.SubscribeAdapter subscribe(String hrn, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.notifications.SubscribeRequest subscribeRequest, Optional<String> billingTag, Optional<String> authorization)
      Path: /subscriptions

      Method: POST

      Expected answers:

      code 201 : String (Created)

      code 400 : String (Bad Request)

      code 403 : String (Forbidden - Access to target resource not available)

      code 500 : String (Internal Server Error)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      subscribeRequest - The subscription request object to create a subscription.
      billingTag - Billing Tag
      authorization - User authorization token
